name: Hungarian Paprika Chicken
ingredientLines: 4 bone-in, skin-on dark meat chicken quarters (leg and thigh attached) or 2 dark meat quarters and 2 bone-in, skin-on chicken breasts (breasts split), brined*
4 bone-in, skin-on dark meat chicken quarters (leg and thigh attached) or 2 dark meat quarters and 2 bone-in, skin-on chicken breasts (breasts split), brined*
4 bone-in, skin-on dark meat chicken quarters (leg and thigh attached) or 2 dark meat quarters and 2 bone-in, skin-on chicken breasts (breasts split), brined*
2 large onions, thinly sliced, yellow or white
2 tablespoons sweet or smoked sweet paprika (you can also mix both for light smoky flavor)
1 1/2 pounds small-medium Yukon Gold potatoes, halve the small or quarter the medium
1/4 cup chopped chives, parsley and dill combined
